dct_title_s: A new & exact map of the coast, countries and islands within ye limits of ye South Sea Company : from ye River Aranoca to Terra del Fuego and from thence through ye South Sea, to ye north part of California &c.
dct_description_sm: This map first appeared in 1711. The three large inset maps were printed on a separate sheet and attached to the top.; Scales of inset maps vary.; Prime meridian: London.; Relief shown pictorially.; Shows prevailing wind directions, towns and villages, rivers, etc.; Includes numerous notes and statement "Sold by Herman Moll."
42 x 48 centimeters on sheet 70 x 53 centimeters
